      • getVariable

        @Nullable
public static final java.lang.Object getVariable(java.lang.String name,
                                    @Nullable
                                    org.bukkit.event.Event e,
                                    boolean local)
        Returns the internal value of the requested variable.

        Do not modify the returned value!

        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        an Object for a normal Variable or a Map for a list variable, or null if the variable is not set.

      • setVariable

        public static final void setVariable(java.lang.String name,
               @Nullable
               java.lang.Object value,
               @Nullable
               org.bukkit.event.Event e,
               boolean local)
        Sets a variable.
        Parameters:
        name - The variable's name. Can be a "list variable::*" (value must be null in this case)
        value - The variable's value. Use null to delete the variable.
